# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We recommend using the latest tagged release of the OpenHealth License Header Gradle plugin. Only the most recent release receives security-related updates.

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 1.0.0   | Yes        |
| < 1.0.0 | No         |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
  
Please submit an issue or pull request for any non critical bugs
or non critical vulnerabilities you find.

In case of a responsible disclosure, please follow instructions
on https://www.gematik.de/datensicherheit#c1227.

## Disclosure Policy

Gematik will prepare a fix and coordinate disclosure with the reporter. A public advisory or release notes entry will be published once a solution is available and the reporter agrees that disclosure can proceed.
